p: This study concerns the genus Capparis sp. “Capparis spinosa” cultivated in SAFI and FEZ regions, collected in July 2016. From each region, stem, leaves, and seeds of Capparis spinosa plant have been collected. In addition, the raw seeds have been collected from 12 plants and mixed and then they have been classified in three different sizes (diameter): ≥7mm, 8/9 mm, and 11/12 mm.
